sources.title: Brick Bradford
sources.description: Title: Brick Bradford Summary: An adventurer travels to the moon to stop a madman from getting hold of the Interceptor Ray, a weapon that could destroy Earth. Directed by: Spencer Gordon Bennet, Thomas Carr Actors: Production Company: Columbia Pictures Release Date: 18 December 1947 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Brick Bradford, soldier-of-fortune and time-machine traveler, is hired to protect the Interceptor Ray, an anti-guided missile weapon. His task takes him to the Moon, where he is captured by subjects of Queen Khana, but is spared because Queen Khana kinda likes him. Back on earth, Brick, Sandy and June get into The Time To (Brick's spinning time-machine) and spin back to the 18th Century where they have to fight off pirates and island natives. Brick finally traps the villain after the Interceptor Ray and world peace is assured.

Back on earth, Brick, Sandy and June get into The Time To (Brick's spinning time-machine) and spin back to the 18th Century where they have to fight off pirates and island natives. metadata.Writer: Clarence Gray, William Ritt, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Kane Richmond, Rick Vallin, Linda Leighton
